attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has demonstated his bumbling ineptitude several times in the last few weeks, culminating in his admission that he made 'mistakes' in withdrawing the 10% income tax band.  His inability to deal with the problems being experienced in the road fuel, banking and housing sectors only serve to compound the problem.  Give ordinary working people a chance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
